Our Journey in Cybersecurity

From founding Slamm SOC Experts to becoming West Africa’s premier cybersecurity partner protecting enterprises across the continent.

2018

Company Established

Slamm SOC Experts was founded with a vision to provide world-class cybersecurity services to African enterprises, focusing on security operations center excellence.

2019

Secured First Major Cybersecurity Contract

Awarded our first enterprise client contract, delivering 24/7 security operations center (SOC) services to a leading financial institution in Africa.

2020

Cybersecurity Team Expansion

Expanded our expert cybersecurity team to 15+ certified security professionals and added advanced threat hunting services.

2021

Client Growth Milestone

Reached over 20 enterprise clients across West Africa, becoming a trusted cybersecurity partner in the region.

2022

Launched Innovation Hub

Introduced our proprietary threat intelligence platform and opened a second SOC operations center in Lagos, Nigeria.

2023

Recognized as Regional Leader in Cybersecurity

Became the leading SOC provider in West Africa with over 50 enterprise clients and achieved ISO 27001 certification.

2024

Received Global Cybersecurity Awards

Awarded international cybersecurity excellence recognition and expanded services with AI-powered threat detection capabilities.

The journey continues as we shape the future of cybersecurity across Africa and beyond.

Cybersecurity SOC Services - Our Core Values

Discover our cybersecurity principles that guide everything we do—from threat detection to incident response. These core values form the foundation of our Security Operations Center (SOC) services and client protection.

Proactive Cybersecurity Defense

We believe in anticipating cyber threats before they cause harm. Our SOC is built to detect early signals, respond swiftly, and stay ahead of adversaries with advanced threat detection.

24/7 Security Monitoring & Vigilance

Cyber threats don't sleep, and neither do we. Our commitment to round-the-clock security monitoring ensures your digital assets are always protected from cyber attacks.

Cybersecurity Integrity & Accountability

We operate with transparency, accuracy, and ethical responsibility. Every security incident, alert, and action is handled with diligence and honesty in our security operations.

Data Confidentiality & Trust

We treat your data as sacred. We follow strict confidentiality protocols and industry best practices to ensure your trust is never compromised in our cybersecurity services.

Security Collaboration & Communication

A SOC isn't just a technical service; it's a partnership. We work together with clients, IT teams, and stakeholders to build cyber resilience together.

Continuous Security Improvement

Cyber threats evolve, and so do we. Through regular training, red teaming, and threat hunting, we ensure our cybersecurity defenses are always one step ahead.

Threat Intelligence Driven Security

We base our cybersecurity actions on real-world, up-to-date threat intelligence to ensure our defenses are rooted in relevance and context for maximum protection.

Client-Centric Cybersecurity Protection

We align our security operations with your business needs. Your uptime, reputation, and compliance are always our top priorities in cybersecurity defense.

Cybersecurity Innovation with Purpose

We embrace automation, AI, and new security tools, not for the buzz, but to improve threat detection speed, reduce false positives, and optimize incident response.

Ready to experience the difference our cybersecurity values make?

Start Your Cybersecurity Journey

Mission

To deliver advanced, AI-powered cybersecurity solutions ensuring proactive protection and resilience, aiming to safeguard client assets from evolving threats.

Vision

To become the global leader in SOC services by seamlessly integrating innovative technology with unmatched cybersecurity expertise.

Strategic Goals

  • Enhance cybersecurity posture for all clients by providing robust and effective solutions.

  • Integrate AI technologies to deliver predictive security analytics for proactive threat mitigation.

  • Foster continuous innovation and adaptability to stay ahead of cybersecurity threats.

Meet Our Leaders

Dr. Samuel Boateng

Chief Executive Officer

Dr. Samuel Boateng, CEO of Slamm Technologies, has over 20 years of experience in IT and cybersecurity. A Principal Security Manager, he specializes in AI-driven security solutions, reverse engineering, pen testing, and vulnerability analysis. He’s also an Adjunct Professor at Marymount University, with expertise spanning AI, threat protection, and secure infrastructure. Dr. Boateng holds a Doctorate in Cyber Information Systems, with advanced degrees in management and IT.

Dr. Boateng leads Slamm Technologies' cybersecurity vision, developing AI-based threat defense strategies, building security infrastructure, and mentoring future professionals through academic leadership.

Dr. Francisca Boateng

Director of Operations

Francisca Boateng brings 20 years of financial leadership across firms like Nextel and the U.S. Census Bureau. As co-founder of Slamm Technologies, she leads finance and marketing strategy. With a BSc in Accounting from Strayer and a diploma from Oxford, she combines financial expertise with social impact as co-founder of the Read2Lead Foundation. Her strength lies in strategic growth and community-driven leadership.

Francisca oversees Slamm Technologies' operational and financial strategies, ensuring growth and sustainability while fostering social impact through education and community initiatives.
